biotools.summary: Quadratic, iterative, K-mer based reconstruction technique that utilizes sparsity promoting ideas from the field of compressed sensing to reconstruct the composition of a bacterial community (when the input data is 454-like pyrosequencing data).

bioschemas.name: Quikr
